This captivating puzzle adventure invites players to piece together iconic scenes from the nation's diverse regions, from the bustling cityscapes to the serene beauty of natural wonders.

Choose your difficulty level, starting from a breezy 30-piece puzzle to a challenging 285-piece masterpiece, ensuring a satisfying experience for puzzle enthusiasts of all skill levels. As you solve each puzzle, unlock panoramic views that showcase the unparalleled beauty of the United States, whether it's the vibrant energy of New York City, the tranquility of the Grand Canyon, or the coastal charm of California.

Delve into the heart of the game with a meticulously crafted map that unveils the geographical wonders of the United States. Your puzzle-solving prowess breathes life into this virtual map, revealing uncharted territories, hidden gems, and triggering dazzling animations that mark your triumphs.

What sets "United States of America Jigsaw Puzzles" apart is its stunning artwork. Each puzzle is a visual masterpiece, capturing the essence of America's landscapes with vibrant colors and intricate details. Immerse yourself in the artistic spectacle as you piece together scenes that celebrate the nation's natural and architectural wonders.

For those seeking an extra challenge, timed trials add a thrilling dimension to the gameplay, testing your speed and puzzle-solving skills. Your progress also unlocks special rewards, from guardian spirits of nature to magical tools, enhancing your quest to assemble the nation's most stunning landscapes and discover hidden treasures.

More than just a game, "United States of America Jigsaw Puzzles" is a tribute to the nation's beauty, offering compelling storytelling, breathtaking artwork, and hours of immersive gameplay. Soar through this captivating world and experience the magic of the United States from a perspective like never before.

item.title: John Mambo
item.description:
About This Game

John Mambo is a frenetic Retro Arcade Game with an isometric top down view.
A Game with a detailed 2D hand drawn Pixel Art style for Windows.



Met John Mambo, a one man army, crazy enough to embark on a dangerous mission in the heart of a jungle. Explore various landscapes, infiltrate enemy bases, cross cities occupied by the enemy and more! Nobody in the allied army trusts John, but John Mambo doesn’t care.
He knows his mission and he will put all his effort to neutralize the enemy. The Colonel will send him on various missions, both funny and dangerous. The outcome of those missions depends on you – the player!

John Mambo is an action video game based on the era of the arcade machines and 16-bit consoles of the 90's, but taking advantage of modern control mechanics and graphics engines . The game is inspired by retro classics like Ikari Warriors, Commando, Mercs and Cannon Fodder.


  • 6 Levels
  • Main Features: Arcade / Strategy / Surreal Humor.

item.title: Speed Night
item.description:
About This Game

· This is a racing role-playing game.
· The player assumes the role of a road driver
· Experience the plot and make choices that trigger different stories
The story sometimes triggers car races, which the player needs to win in order to continue the story
· Motor racing includes practice, regular season, pursuit and time trial
· Beautiful 3D character modeling
· Expansive scenes
· Real car models
· Authentic or entertaining driving experience
· Attractive story plot

item.title: 甜蜜狂潮Honey Fury
item.description:
About This Game


Base Construction and Strategic Card Management. You will construct and defend your base from enemy invasions. Employ clever layouts to enhance your base's defenses and acquire resources through card management. Get ready to embrace this strategic and thrilling honey-fueled frenzy!


The operation of most buildings rely on worker huts.
In addition, various BUFF buildings can provide powerful buffs for defensive towers.
Layout smartly, maximize the utilization of worker huts and BUFF buildings, and create an indestructible base!



Only by holding on to 30 waves of enemy attacks can you win the game.
The number of enemies will be increasing, and the attacks of the 5th, 10th, 15th, 20th, 25th, and 30th waves are even more fierce!
Get ready for this battle!


Character development & building blueprints
Complete the levels and get a lot of honey immediately; light placement gameplay is also available!
Upgrade your character's attributes and enhance your technology with a variety of ways to play!



Only by holding on to the 30 waves of enemy attacks will you be able to achieve the final victory of the game.
The number of enemies will intensify, and the 5th, 10th, 15th, 20th, 25th, and 30th waves will be even more ferocious!
Get ready for the battle!



Different maps have different characteristics and special items
Each map has hidden special items for you to explore


Each card gives you corresponding resources of the same texture every ten seconds.
After you successfully resist the enemy's attack, multiple cards will be drawn according to your resource building.
Pay attention to card type management. Three cards in a row will trigger a straight, bringing twice the output;
And Triplet brings three times the output! Play your mahjong talent and win more resources!

item.title: Master Forge
item.description:
About This Game

Having inherited an old forge, it is now up to you to gather resources and turn them into various products. Display your creations for the locals to buy and fulfill specific requests for those who have them. Gain riches and fame, upgrade your forge and gain access to new resources to expand your product selection. One day, word of your skill may reach the ears of more than just commoners. Will you be able to gain true recognition for your mastery of the forge?

Master Forge is a first-person singleplayer simulation game with a medieval story. You can cut down trees in the forest to get wood. You can gather iron ore or coal in the dark mines. These collected resources are then stored in certain chests. One chest per resource. Two times a day a trader comes by, who wants to sell resources, with varyien prices. Furthermore you can craft different products on the forge by combining the different resources cleverly. In Addition you want to sell all those products to different customers with varying preferences. By earning new gold, you can unlock upgrades which increase your production.

item.title: No Way Out
item.description:
About This Game

The world situation is becoming more and more chaotic, wars are happening everywhere. The wars continue, leading to a nuclear war spreading throughout the world. The world has now become a pile of ruins. Radioactive substances and toxic substances from laboratories have leaked into the outside environment, exposing living animals and even humans. The survivors had to struggle every day to fight off the zombies stalking them, and they had to search for food and water to survive. At the same time, they must find a way to contact the United Nations to be able to reach the Green Zone, an area where the air is truly fresh enough to live.
Genre:
Turn-based card battle game
Developer:
The game was conceptualized and programmed by a person named Nguyen Minh Hung.

item.title: Yeetus
item.description:
About This Game



You are YEETUS! Your weapon? The very floor beneath your feet! YEET your surrounding terrain into destructive projectiles. Be strategic, though. A hasty shot may mean a long fall down to your doom in YEETUS, a casual time survivor game with roguelite elements.

Balance offense and defense! The action here isn't just about YEETing away, but accurately aiming your shots to make sure you're not destroying too much of your own battleground!



Square off against alien monstrosities from other dimensions! Each enemy tests your strategy, aim and reaction time, requiring a strong command of your YEET! The biters will get up-close and personal, while tentacle stars like to shoot at you from a distance. Big boomers will sneak up on you and blow up, taking a lot of your precious terrain with them if you’re not careful!



Enhance your strategy with a wealth of upgrades waiting to be unlocked. Each run will play differently depending on your upgrade choices. Focus on defense and maneuverability or strive for maximum power? The choice is yours! Each game will also give you gold you can use to purchase permanent upgrades so each run will not only help you improve not only your YEETing skills but also your YEETUS’ powers!



As you play you will unlock new levels and characters. You start playing as the balanced Yeetus Regulus; his special skill gives you guaranteed critical shots and doubles tile regeneration. Later step into the speedy boots of Yeetus Speedus, a swifter but fragile choice with a dash skill. Then lastly you will be able to take on the role of the tanky Yeetus Maximus, a slower brute force with more health, damage, and a damage reflecting berserk buff as his special skill.



With mechanics that are easy to pick up but hard to master and the power of YEETing on your side, YEETUS is a fresh take on the rogue-lite time-survivor genre, making you focus not only on your aim but also your positioning as you fight to avoid a painful fall to your death.

The ground is your weapon, how will you wield it?

item.title: Card Detective
item.description:
About This Game

Crime, criminal investigation, interrogation. Can these elements, commonly found in mystery dramas and cop movies, be presented in a game?
Out of a strong interest in the subject matter, the production team studied a large number of books on criminal psychology and consulted with professionals in the field, seeking to understand the discipline as deeply as possible. We have brought our findings to "Card Detective", integrating them deeply with the plot and gameplay.

During our research, we also considered which art style would best fit the story atmosphere. Ultimately, we chose a realistic comic style, using rich variations in shadows, lines, and tones to present the overall atmosphere and foreshadow the plot direction. This is a new attempt for us on the artistic level, and we hope everyone will like it!

story

Players will take on the role of newspaper reporter Hazel Gong, who was originally covering a practice exercise at an abandoned building site, but stumbles upon a mysterious corpse in an accidental collapse!

Faced with the subjective statements of the witnesses from different perspectives, to uncover the truth, Hazel Gong turns to a mysterious bar owner to learn criminal investigation and psychology, and questions the witnesses. Confronted with complex relationships and a series of emergencies, will Hazel Gong be able to uncover the truth of the case?

art

Based on a realistic comic style, the story's atmosphere is depicted through changes in shadows and tones, suggesting the plot's direction.

In terms of character animation, we aim to replicate the real reactions of people being interrogated through the nuanced depiction of micro-expressions, linking character movements and expressions with gameplay.

gameplay

Build your deck flexibly, deliver an OTK, and break through the psychological defenses of the witnesses!

Pay close attention to the story, analyze the veracity of the testimonies, and win easily with non-traditional card game strategies.


Detectives, are you ready to solve the case?

item.title: Soul Street
item.description:
About This Game


"Falling Soul Street is an extremely busy commercial district in Putnam City, but in the past two years, there have been frequent cases of disappearances here, with missing persons of all ages, including strong men, young women, children and the elderly. Unfortunately, some of the cases have not been solved and remain unsolved. People don't know when the name of the shopping street was replaced by the name "Soul Street". According to the rumor, "Soul Street" is connected to a different dimension, and the missing people are sucked into this other world.



As a detective puzzle game, it uniquely integrates the player's choices into the game's plot, creating a strong narrative drive. Every decision you make, whether it's searching for clues, solving puzzles, or even just tiny decisions, will have a direct impact on the direction of the game's plot and the fate of the characters you come into contact with. This design is unique and innovative, and it is cleverly hidden in all corners of the game, requiring the player to use keen observation and reasoning skills to uncover it.
In the course of the game, you will discover secrets hidden in various seemingly insignificant details. Through these clues, you can gradually piece together the truth of the incident and solve the mystery. In the process, you will experience that thrill of pulling the threads out of the cocoon and gradually approaching the truth. However, it is also important to note that some of your decisions may trigger unexpected consequences or even put yourself in danger.


You need to use your intelligence and strategy to solve puzzles and move the game forward by exploring, solving puzzles, reasoning and escaping.
Each puzzle has its own unique difficulty and challenge, requiring you to use various logical thinking skills, spatial imagination, and even strategic planning skills to solve it. Each of your challenges may bring unexpected discoveries and rewards, making your gaming experience full of surprises and satisfaction.


Players have the opportunity to experience first-hand the process of a real detective working on a case. In this session, players need to investigate the complex case in depth and gradually reveal the truth of the incident by collecting clues, questioning suspects and organizing evidence.
The design of this session is very real and fascinating, making players feel like they are in the real detective world. The player's decisions and actions will affect the outcome of the investigation and the ending of the game, making the game more attractive and challenging.

item.title: The last world
item.description:
About This Game

After the world ends, the remaining survivors must defend the last spark of human civilization. Use the camp as a position to repel the waves of monsters in each city! Thay are too powerful? It doesn't matter! Get stronger equipment, learn stronger skills, and finally sweep thousands of armies!

item.title: Karos Classic
item.description:
About This Game

​Karos is a classic of the MMORPG genre, with an amazing fantasy world in which you will find the most unusual adventures. The variety of locations, a great variety of dungeons and monsters will make you plunge into this world headlong.

The beloved world of Azmara, filled with the confrontation between Light and Darkness, returns in its classic form. This legendary version of the game has absorbed all the best things that Karos heroes have loved over the years. It will bring back your original gaming experience and give you the opportunity to take a personal look at the origins of the famous MMORPG and remember how it was used to be. Choose one of four original races, fight for a better future and write your name in the history of your native lands.

FEATURES

- An ideal opportunity to indulge your nostalgia for your favorite game, untouched by years and updates.
​
- Four unique races and many classes, each of which can be developed by choosing additional specializations.

- Intuitive game: no difficulties in mastering.
- PvP at every turn: castle sieges, mine captures, endless battles in the open world.
- Variety of PvE content: raid bosses, many dungeons of varying degrees of difficulty, which can be completed either alone or with a reliable team.

- Interesting Flett system: get the energy of fallen monsters to create powerful equipment that will improve along with your character.
- Mounts turn into beautiful accessories when you walk, and your little pet friends are able to grow and develop.

- Low system requirements.

Years passed, Karos changed, became better, updated. Today, many things look completely different from those in the distant years when we were just launching this legendary MMORPG. And now we are pleased to present you the classic version of Karos. It will take you back to the very beginnings of the Karos world and show you what the game looked like at the time of its inception.

item.title: Towers and Powers
item.description:
About This Game

It isn’t easy being a god, even during peacetime. You have to lead and support your people, help them with the harvest, and encourage their growth… all without them noticing you. But what if your lands are on the edge of a cliff? What if your people approach a whirlpool while being attacked by a horrible, mysterious monster? Well, when that happens, it’s time for you to display all your power and intelligence!



When you play Towers & Powers you’ll find yourself in an ancient land surrounded by the beautiful landscape, elegant buildings, mythical creatures and… chaos! These gorgeous places are under attack! As one of the gods, you’ll have to save your residents and keep their islands from sinking. But the rules forbid you from intervening directly… So what can you do? Only one thing is left: take your powers in your hands!



In Towers & Powers, you’ll create your own teams of peasants, priests, warriors and magicians, decide which buildings they need, use your powers to defend allies and trap foes. Awaiting you on your island you’ll find economic and military tasks to accomplish, exciting battles and travels to undertake, and loyal worshippers, cruel enemies and monsters to encounter. Are you ready to start your divine journey? Play Towers & Powers right this minute!



  • Tower defense in VR!
  • Play standing or sitting, alone or with your cat next to you!
  • Inspect the battlefield from every perspective!
  • Build towers that combine different types of units!
  • Use your units not only in towers but also on battlefields!
  • Accumulate mana and cast spells with your very own hands!
  • Build barricades to hold back enemies!
  • Become a real powerful god!

item.title: 幸存者少女/Survivor Girls
item.description:
About This Game

Game introduction
"Survivor Girls" is a roguelite which is about pretty girls and added a variety of strategic ways based on the traditional roguelike,13 different characters available plus hundreds of weapons and items bring the game more possibilities.

Game features
-Fast-paced and easy to get started with.
-Interesting gameplay. New elements such as entries, skills etc. were added.
-Varied levels, over 10 kinds of enemies and 4 kinds of bosses, feel new at each time.
-A dozen different characters ,hundreds of weapons and items available,unlimited strategies.
-Collection mode and Endless mode bring you different levels of difficulty and experience.
-Exquisite original art setting, extraordinary visual feast.

item.title: Speak of the Devil I: A Deathly Proposition
item.description:
About This Game

Can you imagine staking your very soul just to find love? It's a proposition that most people would find unthinkable. However, our dear friend Michi, driven by sheer desperation, found himself making a fateful decision. In a moment of weakness, he struck a deal with a cunning demon, offering his soul in exchange for the fulfillment of his deepest desires. But as the saying goes, "beware the Devil's bargain." Michi now faces the daunting task of finding a girlfriend within a mere 30 days. Failure to do so will condemn him to an eternity of servitude in the underworld, at the mercy of the demon. Join us in the first chapter of this series as we unravel the events that led Michi down this treacherous path.

Content Warning - This VN Contains the Following:
Partial nudity of characters, characters in sexual situations, characters in sexual poses, references to the demonic world, dark humor and/or conversations, moderate swearing, and dad jokes. Viewer discretion is advised when purchasing this visual novel.

item.title: Tochos vs. Brokens
item.description:
About This Game

The Brokens are invading and only you can save the planet, use your Tochos and defeat the evil forces in this strategic tower defense game.

Features
  • A singleplayer adventure where you'll travel around the world in an attempt to stop the Broken outbreak.
  • Astounding graphics and soundtrack.

item.title: Summon My Girl
item.description:
About This Game

Game Overview
This is a puzzle-filling game with hexagonal blocks. Players need to collect a heart after successfully completing each level, and can increase favorability and obtain items through the love diary option. After accumulating enough hearts, you can summon your wife in the summon interface. Try your luck now!

Product Features
Casual puzzle-solving gameplay
Heart fragment collection
Interesting love diary
Random summoning card draw
CG album mode

item.title: Katana Robo: RTA
item.description:
About This Game

Story

To thwart Samurai Robo's plan to take control of all the robots in the universe by awakening the Dominion Sphere from the highest point on the planet Mechanos, Katana Robo rushes to the Robot Tower, which looks like a platformer game stage made up of buildings, cars, space battleships, and more. Raising his Dominion Sphere as high as he can, Samurai Robo harnesses the power of the Dominion Sphere to bring objects together to create an impromptu robot tower, which is defended by numerous enemy robots that serve Samurai Robo. Katana Robo's journey includes battles with a variety of enemy robots, and it's up to you to destroy the Dominion Sphere before Samurai Robo can fully awaken it and turn the robots of the universe into his minions.

Game Features

Katana Robo: RTA is an 'Mechiro+Only Up Style RTA Action' game, where players utilize their honed action and platformer skills from various games to reach the top floor of the Robot Tower and destroy the Dominion Sphere in the shortest time possible. This game demands quick reflexes and precise controls, while also emphasizing strategic thinking and timing in its unique gameplay.

World Battle Hashtag #KatanaRoboRTA

Compete against gamers from around the world in Katana Robo: RTA using the World Battle hashtag #KatanaRoboRTA This game gives you the opportunity to show off your skills, achieve great records, and rise to the top of the global rankings. Show off your abilities to the world and become the world's strongest Katana Robo!

Convenience

Prioritizing convenience and user experience, Katana Robo: RTA, despite being an Only Up like style game, has implemented a checkpoint system to minimize player frustration. If a player fails a jump action or is destroyed in combat, they can resume the game from the nearest recall point. Additionally, if destroyed in battle, players automatically revive after 10 seconds. These systems maintain the flow of the game and provide a smooth gaming experience for the player.

item.title: Reef Escape
item.description:
About This Game



Being a worm is not easy in this side-scrolling adventure.
After having escaped from the fisherman’s bait can, you plummet down into the reef. There you must make your way out while traveling in a breathable air bubble. Avoid obstacles and explore each level with care since there are hidden items that are essential to get to freedom.



  • Old-school difficulty elements
  • Precision in-game movement to avoid hazards
  • Race against time
  • Follow hints to uncover secrets
  • Stunning 2D original illustrations
  • Classical animation
  • Fun for all ages!

item.title: Keep Up
item.description:
About This Game

Keep Up
Embark on a journey through a world of minimalistic beauty that will test the limits of your perseverance. Keep up is a low-poly platformer that blends difficulty with serenity where every jump is a step towards mastery. Will you be the first to reach the top of the Keep ?

Key Features


  • Stunning Low-Poly World: Immerse yourself in a visually enchanting universe, explore vibrant landscapes as you navigate through a world that is as delightful to behold as it is challenging to conquer.

  • Challenging Platformer Gameplay: Brace yourself for a truly demanding platformer that will push your skills to the limit. Precision and timing are crucial as you navigate an intricate world filled with obstacles and traps. Can you conquer it and rise to the challenge?

  • Unlockable Achievements: Test your mettle and unlock a variety of achievements as you progress through the game. Whether you're a completionist or a casual player, the satisfaction of mastering this world will keep you coming back for more.

  • Community Challenge: Strive to get your score at the top of the leaderboard!

item.title: maboroshi caravan
item.description:
About This Game

■Overview
maboroshi caravan is an auto-play simulation game about a journey through the desert.
The player becomes an observer of the caravan and sometimes watches over, sometimes advises and sometimes helps them on their journey.

■Recommended for
  • Who do not have the time or energy to play games, but want to do something
  • Who like abstract games (Who want to enjoy the freedom of imagination)
  • Who want to enjoy watching the slightest change in the unchanging everyday life
  • Who want to enjoy everyday life in a different world
  • Who love deserts

■Additional information to avoid becoming "Not for me"
  • In terms of classification, it is just like an auto-play game, but it is not a game that focuses on efficiency and growth.
  • It's not a glittering desert. It's a world of dust and wilderness and camels and robbers.
  • There are no shocking developments or heart pounding elements. It's a calm game.

■Story
This desert is later given another name
People called it the Chain Desert
The cursed sandy earth that binds the souls of the dead
There are caravans there to release the souls of the dead trapped in the desert
Caravans appeared and disappeared like a mirage
Its name is――
This is the story of a caravan and the observer who watches over it

■System
The caravan's journey is automatically progressive. They are the ones who decide the destination of the journey.
The player can help them to properly handle the resources they have gathered, expand the size of their caravan, and add more members.

There are three things players should do in the course of the game. It's "Materialization," "Liberation," and "Caravan Leveling Up."

  • Materialization: The Materialization of the Soul Caught in the Chain Desert
  • Liberation: Liberation of the materialized soul from the chain curse
  • Caravan Leveling Up: Expanding the caravan by consuming resources gained during the journey

There are other things you can do to make your journey more varied and efficient, but the basics are to do the above three things.



Once in town, the caravan will conduct transactions and listen to the stories of the townspeople.
The stories that can be heard in town vary from town-related stories, useful stories, and personal stories.
Listen to what they have to say and enjoy the journey the world.



The year in the desert is 354 days. It shows a variety of faces depending on the season, weather, and time.
The events that the caravan encounters along the way will also be affected by the changing environment.

item.title: My Slow Life with the Princess Knight and Her Devoted Handmaiden
item.description:
About This Game

A visual novel about learning to trust again.

STORY


Garland used to be a formidable adventurer.
However, that was back before he was betrayed by his fellows on a quest that left him seriously wounded. Lucky enough to make it out with his life but unluckily without family or relatives, he is in no shape to look after himself due to his injuries. What he does have left is his adventurer’s spirit, which fuels his hopes to make a full recovery and head out to face the world again.

In the meantime, what he needs is someone to take care of him...
But having been deceived by a band he thought he trusted, and now being grievously wounded, what he’s shortest on is faith in anyone else. Complicating the situation even further, word of the fortune Garland acquired through his personal disaster has spread far enough that everyone he meets seems to be after his money. If he had his health he might have little to fear, but as the situation stands, he needs help that he can rely on. At the moment, Garland needs assistance to survive.

As he mulls over what to do, the news reaches his ears that his homeland has captured a certain smaller nation. He also happens to see in passing some citizens from that fallen nation, perhaps captured during the takeover, being transported to be sold off as indentured servants. As an adventurer who believes in freedom, Garland doesn’t like the idea, but with such unfortunates trust is optional: magic makes them obedient.

After much consideration and lacking other options, he makes the decision to get the help he needs—whatever it costs.

CHARACTERS


Alienor (Voice: Aika Kashiwagi)

The eldest princess-in-exile of the fallen kingdom of Pixenzax. Called “Allie” by her family and friends, she is a tomboy with a strong disposition, perhaps because of her natural temperament.

Due to her talent with a blade and her popularity, she served as a Princess Knight before her country was destroyed through the dealings of a traitor and she was taken captive. During a physical examination after her capture, she was found to have a birthmark unique to royalty and was thus treated as a high-status hostage.
When Garland comes to town to hire help, she meets her destiny.


Farna (Voice: Miina Ayukawa)

Princess Alienor’s lady-in-waiting.

She loves Alienor as if she were her own sister. As a handmaiden, she is good at all household chores, but not so skilled at rougher work.

She was captured alongside Alienor and sold to a broker, in whose care she was treated reasonably well thanks to her good looks and her former station.

When Garland patronizes the shop, she notices that he seems kind and has tons of money. Convincing the shopkeep that she and Allie could turn him a tidy profit if Garland were to buy the two as a set, she succeeds in pushing them through as a package deal.
She trusts Garland to some extent on account of his personality.


Garland (Voice: -)

An adventurer who hopes to return to his occupation and the main character of this game.

After the death of his parents, he left his unremarkable hometown for the city to become an adventurer. Perhaps because he had an aptitude for the profession, he steadily gained ability and became a formidable adventurer at a young age.

While participating in a quest he was invited onto by colleagues he trusted, his group fell into a dire situation, and he was severely injured after being abandoned to create a distraction.

Now no longer able to trust others, he returns to his family home in the woods. However, his trust issues are not his only problem, because his injuries leave him unable to live alone. As a compromise, he decides to acquire a caretaker in the form of servants who are magically bound never to betray him.

item.title: Wanting Wings
item.description:
About This Game

STORY

At Seiyou Girls' academy, there are rumors of an angel.

Our story takes place at the end of their second term, just before Christmas.

Hina, Rin, and Fumi: three girls that became roommates since spring.

The three of them all come from diverse backgrounds and have completely different personalities, but they share one strange similarity:
They all saw an angel when they were younger.

And they all gradually begin to suspect that one of their roommates might be the angel they've heard about...

Features

- A cute yet touching visual novel
- Lots of colorful CGs to explore!
- Two games in one package! (Wanting Wings & its sequel Faraway Feathers)
- Multiplatform support for Windows, Mac, and Linux!

item.title: SPIN UP
item.description:
About This Game

Story
SPIN UP is a climbing action game set on a planet.
After falling to an unknown planet, players aim for the top in order to return to their friends.

Overview
The game is controlled with the left and right keys, and the player climbs by "grabbing" and "spinning".

Pressing the key allows the player to grab onto any object,
While grabbing an object, the player rotates while accelerating.
The moment you release the key, it will fly away by the rotational force.

Where it flies depends on the rotation force and the timing of releasing the key.

Don't give up.
We are waiting for you at the top!


About video distribution
  • Both individuals and corporations can distribute their videos.
  • Monetization is only possible when using the functions provided by the video sharing site.

item.title: Racket Club
item.description:
About This Game

If you’re a fan of racket sports - from tennis to pickleball or padel to ping-pong - Racket Club is for you! Hit the courts in this all-new sport created for VR that combines the best of these sports and allows players to immerse themselves into a fully-social experience of a real racket club.

  • REAL FUN - Play in singles or doubles multiplayer, or go for single-player glory in Career Mode.
  • REAL MOVEMENT - A new sport that captures the authentic feel of play with real movement (no virtual locomotion!), Racket Club employs physics and interactions as close to real life racket sports as you can imagine, all within a space that fits in your home.
  • REAL(LY) SOCIAL - Step onto the court in an authentic club experience! Meet new players and reconnect with old friends, on and off the court, as you partner up for doubles, compete in singles, or spectate courtside together.
  • REAL GOOD AI BOTS - Take on AI bots up through the highest competitive level or just use them to warm up and hone your skills.

Coming December 14, 2023. Wishlist today!

item.title: Starfend
item.description:
About This Game

Place defenses strategically, upgrade and combine them. Starfend is a 3D tower defense game set in a vast space universe where you will take command of a powerful fleet of advanced spaceships. Your mission is to protect the orbit of inhabited planets against a relentless horde of malevolent meteors that threaten to destroy.
Get ready to face an endless succession of challenges, as the game has endless levels, each one more intense and exciting than the last. At each level, you'll be confronted with different models of meteors, each with a different type of protection to try to break through your defenses.

Your arsenal of space defenses includes 10 types of ships with 10 levels, each equipped with futuristic weapons and special abilities. Carefully plan your tactics, place ships in strategic locations around the meteor paths, upgrade your turrets and combine them to get strongger and meet the ever-increasing challenges the hostile universe presents.
In addition, the 3D gameplay brings an immersive and dynamic experience, allowing you to freely explore, rotate the view and get a complete perspective of space combat.

CameraControls: Hold mouse right click and drag to look around.
W - move forward, S - move backward, A - move left, D - move right, Q - move down, E - move up or Hold mouse left click and drag to move the camera. hold shift to increase camera speed.F - Change to free camera. R - reset free camera position. use arrows to switch beteween static cameras, use mouse scroll to zoom in and out.Use mouse left click for interactions.

item.title: Ordinary Day
item.description:
About This Game

Ordinary Day takes place in a fictional town run by The Church. Founded by the early members and quickly swept in darkness as they uncovered the horror contained nearby, clouded and driven by an external force the church enforced their own rules upon the town, driven to rebirth the darkness. You are bound from birth to fufil a singular purpose, it awaits the day your soul is weakened.

⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀

You return from a party running late in to the night, exhausted with a long drive ahead you set off home. A decision that changed your life and kicked in motion the ever growing darkness lingering in your soul, enter this not so ordinary horror and uncover the shroud of mysteries.

item.title: RBM Studio's Gettysburg
item.description:
About This Game

In RBM Studio's Gettysburg, take command of either the Confederate or Union forces for the Battle of Gettysburg, the single bloodiest battle of the U.S. Civil War. Each side has an historically accurate order of battle that details when and where reinforcements will arrive, letting the player attempt to outdo the generals of history. As the Confederate commander Lee, it's your task to either crush the Union forces or secure a safe route for your continued invasion of the North. As the Union commander Meade, you must at least match the losses inflicted by the Confederates while also securing the roads leaving Gettysburg towards D.C.

RBM Studio's Gettysburg features gameplay based on the historical wargaming boardgames of the 70's and 80's. Players maneuver markers that represent their units on a hexagonal map that mimics the gameboard and cardboard counters of traditional boardgames. Turns are completed in an "I go, you go" style, wherein players alternate their turns with their opponent until one player passes. Once that happens, a random number of unopposed actions are given to their opponent. Pass too early and you risk giving your opponent the opportunity to maneuver completely around your forces. Combat is resolved through die rolls modified by terrain, battle line factors, and the use of artillery support. Attackers benefit from flanking defenders. Defenders benefit from being in defensible terrain.

Artillery support is a finite resource, so think carefully about when to use it. If both players use artillery in an engagement, an artillery duel is conducted in which at most one player will receive the bonus but both players risk losing additional artillery support if their opponent's cannon manage to hit their own.

The Confederates begin the game with less artillery support but ultimately receive more units and benefit from a greater area of influence generated by General Lee. Only the Union player can deploy a special sharpshooter unit that protects a single hex from the Confederate advance. Careful placement of this unit can help block a Confederate advance farther into the North.

Key Features

  • Command your units in an historically accurate representation of the real Battle of Gettysburg.
  • Maneuver to try and pin your opponent's forces, while keeping your own free to act.
  • Manage your artillery usage to avoid being overrun late in the game if your opponent still has resources left.
  • Choose your fights carefully - losing artillery and men attempting to capture a well-defended hex without adequate preparation is a sure path to defeat.
  • Solo play as both sides to explore the rules and potential strategies.
  • Online multiplayer play against a human opponent.

item.title: Cave Runner
item.description:
About This Game

Run at blinding speeds using wire anchors,
and escape from the cave in time.

The game has no heavy story, no tedious material collection, no complicated synthesis,
and no moving encounters and goodbyes.

We just keep on running.
Faster, faster, faster, faster

There are two ways to play: escape mode and time attack mode.
In escape mode, the objective is to escape from the cave within a set time.
In Time Attack mode, you can choose any course and compete for the time from start to finish.
Once you have a satisfactory time, upload your score and participate in the ranking.
Players' replay data can also be saved as ghosts and downloaded from the leaderboard.
(They can also be exchanged directly between users.)

item.title: Cookie Cutter
item.description:
About This Game

The Void. The Matter. The Megastructure. A dystopian world with an egomaniac leader determined to unveil the secrets of the universe. INFONET promised a utopia built on the backs of tireless androids called Denzels. It was a lie.



200 years later the planet is decaying and the mysterious Red Seed has been stolen. Raz, a renegade mechanic, searches a hidden lab and discovers the Denzel Cherry, butchered and left for dead, clinging to life by sheer will alone. Her creator—and the love of her life, Doctor Shinji Fallon—has been taken by a demented sicko and Cherry intends to make him—and anybody or anything who gets in her way—pay.

Fueled by love and powered by rage, join Cherry on a blood-soaked quest for revenge as she explores the massive Megastructure and eviscerates the armies of INFONET in an unforgettable over-the-top 2D platformer that breaks tropes and bones.




Cookie Cutter is unabashedly irreverent, violent, and risqué. Become Cherry, a badass android on a rage-filled and love-driven quest. To save her beloved creator she’ll explore and fight her way through a unique illustrated sci-fi dystopian world as she chainsaw-murders anybody who stands in her way.




Every frame of this immersive experience is drawn by hand with copious amounts of love. That means epic, fall-out-of-your-chair visuals. Grotesque bugs and menacing robots. Gargantuan bosses. Ridiculous weapons, special moves, and brutal gory finishers. All of it brought to life with benchmark 2D animation.




Whether you’re ripping the wings off overgrown mosquitos, impaling mini-bosses, crushing robots on Cherry’s motorcycle, or kick-punch-uppercut-stomping waves of foes with complex combos, you won’t find a better fighting experience with responsiveness and all the flair you could ask for in a Metroidvania.




Far future dystopia? Check. An android companion turned rage-filled killer? Check. Over-the-top characters and enemies? Check. Buckets of blood? Of course. Experience our bizarre tale, inspired by Japanese manga and Quentin Tarantino films, through 10 huge zones, each weirder than the next.
